## Public Member Functions

### erase() {#ab508a6297bcb823ca9d561facc241470}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void LoopInfo::erase (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42; L)</>}>
Update <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfo">LoopInfo</a> after removing the last backedge from a loop.

This updates the loop forest and parent loops for each block so that <code>L</code> is no longer referenced, but does not actually delete <code>L</code> immediately. The pointer will remain valid until this <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfo">LoopInfo</a>&#39;s memory is released.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/loopinfo-h/#l00435">435</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/loopinfo-h">LoopInfo.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopinfo-cpp/#l00887">887</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopinfo-cpp">LoopInfo.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### invalidate() {#a652aa0b059d50fc8ce065498020075e7}

  prototype={<>bool LoopInfo::invalidate (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp; F, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/preservedanalyses">PreservedAnalyses</a> &amp; PA, FunctionAnalysisManager::Invalidator &amp;)</>}>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/loopinfo-h/#l00426">426</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/loopinfo-h">LoopInfo.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopinfo-cpp/#l00878">878</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopinfo-cpp">LoopInfo.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### movementPreservesLCSSAForm() {#aee580d948709366b6a676f8b48460137}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool llvm::LoopInfo::movementPreservesLCSSAForm (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; Inst, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; NewLoc)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Checks if moving a specific instruction can break LCSSA in any loop.

Return true if moving <code>Inst</code> to before <code>NewLoc</code> will break LCSSA, assuming that the function containing <code>Inst</code> and <code>NewLoc</code> is currently in LCSSA form.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/loopinfo-h/#l00465">465</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/loopinfo-h">LoopInfo.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### replacementPreservesLCSSAForm() {#ab12b535502b86394c84bfd24d58e4657}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool llvm::LoopInfo::replacementPreservesLCSSAForm (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; From, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; To)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Returns true if replacing From with To everywhere is guaranteed to preserve LCSSA form.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/loopinfo-h/#l00439">439</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/loopinfo-h">LoopInfo.h</a>.
